fullText:
Bolstering Guardian

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, druid, Primal Guardian class feature
Benefit: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a druid attack power, one ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 143.
name: Bolstering Guardian
